page.title: 07TRADE
page.content: At Skelly's Garage,Bogside,Wishaw there are 350 cars in the compound. There are 40-50 cars bought a week and the main dealer is V.A.G.(U.K.Ltd.) Ian Skelly employs 64 people in this branch,10 mechanics and 54 office staff.The Bogside branch employees mostly live locally.The buyers of the cars mostly come from the area. The prices of the cars vary from Â£100-Â£20,000 and the busiest day of the week is Saturday. The hours of business are 9a.m.-9p.m.Monday -Friday and on Saturday they open at 9a.m.and close at 7p.m. In the branch there are 75 brand new cars. Although Ian Skelly's is a garage it does not sell petrol, only cars.
